translation: The deluded do not see Him who departs, stays, and enjoys; but those who possess the eye of knowledge behold Him.
commentary: 15.10 Departing departing? staying staying? or or? Even also? enjoying eating? or or? united with the Gunas? deluded the deluded? Not not? do not see do see (Him)? See behold (Him)? Jnanacaksusah those who possess the eye of knowledge.Commentary Though the Self is nearest and comes most easily within their field of vision or consciousness? the ignorant and the deluded are not
